Main pronunciation 主要发音: chún

Original meaning 本义: Meaning (orig) to irrigate, now meaning honest (clean like water)

English senses 英语理解: irigate. Honest.

Usage example 用法举例: 淳良 chún liáng (kind and honest)

湻字的基本解释

湻
chún
古同“淳”。

湻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chún］
［《廣韻》常倫切，平諄，禪。］
亦作“湻1”。
(1)深厚；浓厚。
(2)质朴；敦厚。
(3)纯粹。
(4)平和。
(5)见“淳鹵”。
(6)成对。
(7)见“淳淳”。
(8)通“焞”。光明。参见“淳燿”。
[②]［zhūn］
［《集韻》朱倫切，平諄，章。］
浇灌。
[③]［zhǔn］
［《集韻》主尹切，上準，章。］
古代丈量标准。参见“淳3制”。

湻字的康熙字典解释
湻字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
湻字的起名意思

古同“淳”，有质朴，朴实，纯粹之义，也可形容酒味道浓厚。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chún］
["Guangyun" Chang Lunqie, flat and simple, Zen. ]
Also known as "湻1".
(1) Deep; thick.
(2) Simple and honest.
(3) Pure.
(4) Peace.
(5) See "Chunlu".
(6) Pairs.
(7) See "Chunchun".
(8) Through "焞". bright. See "Chun Yao".
[②]［zhūn］
["Jiyun" Zhu Lunqie, flat and simple, chapter. ]
water.
[③] [zhǔn]
["Ji Yun" Lord Yin Qi, first standard, chapter. ]
Ancient measurement standard. See "Atsushi 3 system".

Name meaning
The ancient tongs are "sincere", which is simple, simple and pure. It can also be described as a wine with a strong taste.
